text: hi everyone is Helen here today I'm
gonna make game tribal or avocado ice
cream some of you will be like what
avocado in the desserts I know that
might sound a little weird for
Westerners but actually for Asians
especially for us in South Asian regions
we love to have avocado in desserts and
we don't really use avocado in our
salads or several dishes like in the
West the dish we're going to have today
is very easy to make but you're going to
be surprised how great egret turns out
so let's begin you're gonna need three
small avocados choose the ones that are
well ripe and soft cut in half remove
the stone and take out the flesh you're
gonna get about 2 cups of avocado flesh
place into a food processor together
with four tablespoons of yogurt then
pause to blend well next add 150 ml or
2/3 cups of whipping cream in a large
bowl then whip up the cream using a hand
mixer or a balloon whisk to make it
easier to whip up the cream place the
bowl the whisk and the cream into the
freezer about 15 minutes before beating
keep beating until you get styptic
meaning when you lift up the bitters the
cream gonna stand right up you should
stop beating when it reaches this stage
otherwise the cream gonna split to that
add three tablespoons of sweetened
condensed milk and the avocado puree
then mix it up using the foreign market
meaning you use the spatula to scrape
the bottom of the bowl and then lift it
up in the center when the mixture is
homogeneous pour it into a container
make sure you put the container at least
six hours into the freezer before using
smoothen the surface cover and put it
into the freezer
you can take it out after two hours and
give it a good mix that will make the
ice cream smoother after about eight
hours you can have the perfect avocado
ice cream look at this so smooth and
creamy gently run the ice cream scooper
along the surface of the ice cream and
then check out one nice round scoop
sprinkle some toasted coconut on top
some chocolate sauce if you have a
little bit of roasted crushed peanuts
mmm it's rich creamy and so delicious I
hope you liked this quick and easy
recipe if you give it a try send me a
photo on instagram with hashtag Helen
recipes also don't forget to give this
video a thumbs up and subscribe to my
channel for more delicious Vietnamese
food thank you for watching bye bye
